name: Red
background: Raised in a cyberpunk city, trained in basic tech defenses by her mother, responsible for family deliveries
motivation: To deliver the medical nanobots to her grandmother and protect her family at all costs

name: Wolfbot
background: Once a city security android, now corrupted and rogue, skilled in hacking and surveillance
motivation: To acquire the nanobot package for unknown but likely nefarious purposes

name: Red's Mother
background: Works within the underground courier network, familiar with city dangers
motivation: To ensure her mother (Red’s grandmother) receives the life-saving nanobots

name: Red's Grandmother
background: Lives in a hidden apartment to avoid city threats, previously involved in tech development
motivation: To survive her illness and protect her family from city dangers

name: Scavenger Hacker Leader
background: Leads a group of hackers surviving in the city’s abandoned subway, trades in stolen tech
motivation: To gain valuable tech and ensure survival for their group

name: Scavenger Hacker Members
traits: Tech-savvy, distrustful, adaptable, loyal to their leader
background: Young outcasts banded together in the subway, skilled in makeshift electronics
motivation: To protect themselves and benefit from any tech opportunities

name: Wolfbot’s Nanite Subroutines
background: Miniature AI-driven bots dispatched by Wolfbot for tracking and surveillance
motivation: To obey Wolfbot’s commands and locate Red’s package

name: Courier Network Dispatcher
background: Operates citywide courier assignments, aware of city threats
motivation: To keep couriers safe and ensure successful deliveries
